name: Blood Betrayal
text: Attached character cannot be declared as an attacker or defender while its controller has less than 4 total STR in his or her dead pile.
flavor: A man must purge himself of bad blood.

name: Frequent Leechings
text: Attached character gets +1 STR. Response: discard Frequent Leechings from play (cannot be saved) to save attached character from being killed. Then, stand that character.

name: Hodor
text:
No attachments. Deadly.
Hodor cannot be declared as an attacker.
Hodor cannot be bypassed by characters with stealth.

name: Osha
text: Stealth. Response: after a [stark] character is killed, stand Osha. Then, she gets +3 STR and is immune to events until the end of the phase.
flavor: "Winter's got no King. If you'd seen it, you'd know that, summer boy."

name: Ser Rodrik Cassel
text:
No attachments. Immune to character abilities.
While Ser Rodrik Cassel is attacking or defending, characters cannot have their STR raised by triggered effects.

name: Dreadfort Captain
text: Response: after you play Dreadfort Captain from your hand, choose and kill a neutral character with STR lower than the total STR in your dead pile.
flavor: He was a northman, but not a Winterfell man. He belonged to Roose Bolton.

name: Greywater Watchmen
text:
No attachments. Deadly.
Greywater Watchmen gains stealth during a phase in which its STR has been raised or lowered.

name: River Rider
text: Any phase: kneel River Rider to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR (+2 STR instead if that character has the Army trait).

name: Robb's Sworn Swords
text: No attachments. Deadly. Renown. Response: after Robb's Sworn Swords comes into play or leaves play, choose and kill a neutral character.

name: Shackled Defender
text: [doomed]
flavor: On their banner was a giant in shattered chains that told him that these were Umber men, down from the northlands beyond Last River.

name: Wolf Stalwart
text: While Wolf Stalwart is participating in a challenge, other participating characters with printed STR 3 or lower do not count their STR.

name: The White Knife
text: Characters with STR 6 or higher do not kneel to defend.
flavor: "I left six hundred men at the ford. Spearmen from the rills, the mountains, and the White Knife."

name: Deepwood Motte
text: Deathbound. Response: after Deepwood Motte comes into play, return all other Battlefield locations to their owners' hands. While you have 4 or more total STR in your dead pile, you may declare an additional [military] challenge each phase. [doomed]

name: Bogs of the Neck
text: After a player loses a challenge by 4 or more total STR, characters he or she controls cannot be saved until the end of the phase.

name: Fields of Ice
text: Challenges: kneel Fields of Ice to choose a defending character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +5 STR.
flavor: It looked all stones and glass, though they could hear the sound of water running beneath the frozen surface.

name: A Better Offer
text:
Attach to a character with printed STR 2 or lower.
Take control of attached character.
flavor: "Is that all? My sister will pay ten times as much." -Jaime Lannister

name: Mad with Power
text:
Power on attached character does not count towards its controller's total power.
Attached character's controller needs X additional power to win the game, where X is the amount of power on attached character.

name: Varys's Counsel
text:
Attached character gets +2 STR.
While attached character has an [intrigue] icon, it gains stealth.
flavor: "It is so very good to see you looking so strong and well," Varys said with his slimiest smile.

name: Bronn
text: No attachments. Deadly. Any phase: kneel 2 influence to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, if that character would be killed and Bronn is kneeling, stand Bronn instead of killing that character.

name: Grand Maester Pycelle
text: Response: after an opponent's effect reveals one or more cards, reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand (limit 3 per phase).
flavor: Pycelle is a toad. But better a Lannister toad than a Tyrell toad, no?

name: Ser Addam Marbrand
text: No attachments. While you control more Lord character than any opponent, your Army characters do not kneel to attack or defend.

name: Bronn's Hireling
text: Deadly.
flavor: "Once they're dead, they don't come back." -Bronn

name: Defenders of King's Landing
text: No attachments. Deadly. Stealth. Response: after Defenders of King's Landing comes into play or leaves play, choose and kneel up to 2 characters.

name: House Brax Footmen
text: No attachments. Deadly. Response: after House Brax Footmen's STR has been raised or lowered, choose and kneel a character with STR 3 or lower.

name: Lion Lord
text: While Lion Lord is participating in a challenge, other participating characters with printed STR 1 or lower do not count their STR.
flavor: "By what right does the wolf judge the lion? By what right?" -Jaime Lannister

name: Master Spy
text:
Stealth.
Opponents with less than 4 total STR in their dead pile must play with their hands revealed.

name: The Halfman's Horde
text: No attachments. Deadly. The Halfman's Horde's STR cannot be lowered. Any phase: if Tyrion Lannister is in play, kneel the Halfman's Horde and choose a location. That location gains the Battlefield trait until the end of the phase. [doomed]

name: Fair Isle
text: Characters with STR 6 or higher gain an [intrigue] icon and do not kneel to attack during [intrigue] challenges.

name: The Blackwater Shores
text: Deathbound. Response: after The Blackwater Shores comes into play, return all other Battlefield locations to their owners' hands. While you have 4 or more total STR in your dead pile, lower the cost for you to play characters by 1. [doomed]

name: Banks of the Tumblestone
text: After a player loses a challenge by 4 or more total STR, he or she must choose and kneel a standing character he or she controls.
flavor: Through the stone, she could hear the faint rush of the Tumblestone.

name: Oathkeeper
text: Attached character gets +3 STR while you control no Mercenary, Ally, or Traitor character. Response: kneel Oathkeeper to save attached character from being killed or discarded if attached character has 1 or more power.

name: Accepted Destiny
text: Attached character gets +1 STR for each power on your House.

name: The Bastard of Nightsong
text: While an opponent's House card is kneeling, raise the Claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

name: Ser Axel Florent
text:
No attachments.
Ser Axel Florent does not stand during the standing phase unless you kneel 1 influence.
While Axel Florent is kneeling, he gains renown and is immune to opponent's events.

name: Army of Light
text: No attachments. Deadly. Renown. Response: after Army of Light comes into play or leaves play, choose and kneel up to 2 locations.

name: Faithless Follower
text: Faithless Follower gets +1 STR and gains a [military] icon if you control no other characters with printed STR 1.
flavor: Stannis snorted. "Bar Emmon, that boy? My faithless grandfather?"

name: Ser Garlan's Battalion
text: No attachments. Deadly. While Ser Garlan's Battalion is participating in a challenge, all other participating non-Army characters lose deadly. [doomed]

name: Stag Guardian
text:
Immune to opponent's events.
While Stag Guardian is participating in a challenge, other participating character with printed STR 2 or lower do not count their STR.

name: Stannis's Northern Cavalry
text:
No attachments. Deadly.
Stannis's Northern Cavalry cannot be killed or discard from play during a phase in which its STR has been raised or lowered.

name: Turncoat Lord
text: Opponents with less than 4 total STR in their dead pile do not claim power for unopposed challenges.
flavor: I know you for a man of ambition, a man who changes kings and gods the way I change my boots.

name: Cape Wrath
text: Characters with STR 6 or higher cannot be chosen as the only target of an event card or character ability.
flavor: If he survived this night, he would take Devan and sail home to Cape Wrath and his gentle Marya.

name: Mouth of the Blackwater
text: Deathbound. Response: after Mouth of the Blackwater comes into play, return all other Battlefield locations to their owners' hands. While you have 4 or more total STR in you dead pile, stand all of your characters at the beginning of each phase. [doomed]

name: Field Command Tent
text: Any phase: kneel Field Command Tent and kneel a character you control to choose and stand a character with higher printed STR than the printed STR of the knelt character.
flavor: He does not stint himself, this Renly, she thought as she looked about. Small wonder his host moves so slow.

name: Fields of Storm's End
text: After a player loses a challenge by 4 or more total STR, he or she must move 1 power from his or her House to a character in play, if able.

name: Salla's Escort Ship
text: Challenges: kneel Salla's Escort Ship to choose two characters. Until the end of the phase, one of those characters gets -1 STR and the other gets +1 STR.
flavor: "A certain Lysene pirate once told me that a good smuggler stays out of sight." -Ser Davos Seaworth

name: Blessed with Iron
text: Attached character gets +2 STR. Response: after a character or location is saved, stand attached character.
flavor: "Bless him with salt, bless him with stone, bless him with steel." -Aeron Damphair

name: Alannys Greyjoy
text: Immune to events. Any phase: until the end of the phase, raise or lower the total STR in any player's dead pile by 2 (limit once per phase).

name: Captain Bluetooth
text: Challenges: discard a Warship location from play (cannot be saved) to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR.

name: Asha's Raiders
text: No attachments. Deadly. Response: after Asha's Raiders's STR has been raised or lowered, it gains renown until the end of the phase.
flavor: Fear! Foes! Raiders! Raiders!

name: Cleftjaw's Reavers
text: No attachments. Deadly. Challenges: Cleftjaw's Reavers gets +2 STR for the duration of the challenge (limit once per phase). [doomed]

name: Damphair's Faithful
text: Response: after a character is saved, Damphair's Faithful gets +3 STR and gains an [intrigue] and a [power] icon until the end of the phase.
flavor: ... those hands gripped driftwood cudgels, hard as iron, for the god had armed them from his arsenal beneath the sea.

name: Drowned Pillager
text: Response: after you play Drowned Pillager from your hand, if you have at least 4 total STR in your dead pile, choose and discard a kneeling location.

name: Euron's Counselor
text: Immune to events. Any phase: kneel Euron's Counselor to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character is immune to events.

name: Goodbrother Recruit
text: Challenges: kneel Goodbrother Recruit to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a [military] icon.
flavor: The Goodbrothers of Old Wyk, the Goodbrothers of Great Wyk, and the Goodbrothers of Orkmont all had come.

name: King Euron's Horde
text: No attachments. Deadly. Renown. Response: after King Euron's Horde comes into play or leaves play, search you deck for a Warship location and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Kraken Conqueror
text: While Kraken Conqueror is participating in a challenge, other participating characters with printed STR 2 or lower do not count their STR.

name: Isle of Orkmont
text: Characters with STR 6 or higher gain deadly.
flavor: "You are to harry the Stony Shore, raiding the fishing villages and sinking any ships you chance to meet." -Balon Greyjoy

name: Torrhen's Square
text: Deathbound. Response: after Torrhen's Square comes into play, return all other Battlefield locations to their owners' hands. While you have 4 or more total STR in your dead pile, opponents must pay a +1 gold penalty for the first location they play each marshalling phase. [doomed]

name: Blacktyde Longship
text: Response: kneel Blacktyde Longship to save a character with printed STR 4 or higher from being killed or discarded.
flavor: "And there's old Drumm's Thunderer, with Blacktyde's Nightflyer beside her." -The Reader

name: The Stony Shore
text: After a player loses a challenge by 4 or more total STR, he or she discards the top 2 cards of his or her deck.
flavor: The Northmen would not realize their true peril, not until the hammers fell...

name: Wooed by Xaro
text: Attached character gets +1 STR for each attachment in play.
flavor: "If you see here anything that you would desire, O most beautiful of women, you have only to speak and it is yours." -Xaro Xhoan Daxos

name: Aggo
text: Daenerys Targaryen gets +4 STR.
flavor: Outside her door she found Aggo fitting a new string to his bow by the light of a swinging oil lamp.

name: Oznak zo Pahl
text:
Deadly.
While Oznak zo Pahl is attacking, each character with STR 1 or lower controlled by the defending opponent must be declared as a defender, if able.

name: The Titan's Bastard
text: House Targaryen only. Response: after a card is placed in your dead pile, put The Titan's Bastard into play from your hand. Response: after a card is place in an opponent's dead pile, return The Titan's Bastard to its owner's hand.

name: Braavosi Pirate
text: Dominance: kneel 2 influence to choose an attachment on another character. Move that attachment to Braavosi Pirate if it is eligible.

name: Child of the Alleys
text: Challenges: kneel Child of the Alleys to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR. If you win that challenge, choose and discard an attachment from play, if able.

name: Dragon Partisan
text:
Opponents cannot play attachments on Dragon Partisan.
While Dragon Partisan is participating in a challenge, other participating characters with printed STR 1 or lower do not count their STR.

name: Grey Worm's Strongest
text: No attachments. Deadly. Renown. Response: after Grey Worm's Strongest comes into play or leaves play, choose a non-unique character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

name: Illyrio's Guard
text: No attachments. Deadly. Response: after Illyrio's Guard's STR has been raised or lowered, attachments you control cannot be discarded until the end of the phase.

name: Qartheen Tax Collector
text: Opponents with less than 4 total STR in their dead pile pay a +2 gold penalty on attachments.
flavor: "I will make certain to keep my pouch full of pennies. Even a prince must pay his taxes."

name: The Liberated
text:
No attachments. Deadly.
At the beginning of the dominance phase, choose and discard an attachment from play (cannot be saved) or discard The Liberated from play (cannot be saved).
[doomed]

name: Fields of Ghiscar
text: Deathbound. Response: after Fields of Ghiscar comes into play, return all other Battlefield locations to their owners' hands. While you have 4 or more total STR in your dead pile, you may play the topmost attachment with cost 1 or greater in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. [doomed]

name: Gates of Meereen
text: After a player loses a challenge by 4 or more total STR, he or she must choose and discard an attachment he or she controls, if able.
flavor: Scorched fields and poisoned wells had greeted her at every hand.

name: Lyseni Merchant Cog
text: Challenges: kneel Lyseni Merchant Cog to choose a defending character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as though its printed text box were blank.

name: New Ghis
text: Characters with STR 6 or higher gain a [power] icon and renown.

name: Of Oberyn's Blood
text: Attached character gets +6 STR during a phase in which you have lost a challenge.
flavor: "Some men think because they are afraid to do." -Tyene Sand

name: Taste for Blood
text: Attached characters gets +1 STR. Response: after you lose a challenge as the defender, attached character claims 1 power.
flavor: All men share a taste for blood...

name: Edric Dayne
text: Dominance: kneel Edric Dayne and kneel 3 influence to choose and discard a neutral character from play.
flavor: "I'm Edric Dayne, the...the Lord of Starfall."

name: Harmen Uller
text:
Renown.
While you have 7 or more cards in your hand, Harmen Uller does not kneel to attack.
flavor: Half of the Ullers are half-mad, so the saying went, and the other half are worse.

name: Dornish Confessor
text: Challenges: kneel Dornish Confessor to choose a character with fewer than 2 icons. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR.

name: Horsemen of Starfall
text: No attachments. Deadly. Response: after Horsemen of Starfall's STR has been raised or lowered, draw a card.

name: Lord Yronwood's Spears
text:
No attachments. Deadly.
[doomed]

name: Prince Doran's Advisor
text: Opponents with less than 4 total STR in their dead piles cannot play event cards that have no influence cost.

name: Sun Champion
text: While Sun Champion is participating in a challenge, other participating characters with printed STR 2 or lower do not count their STR.

name: The Viper's Bannermen
text: No attachments. Deadly. Stealth. Response: after The Viper's Bannermen comes into play or leaves play, reveal the top 2 cards of your deck, then put them into your hand.

name: Tower Guard
text: Dominance: kneel 1 influence and discard Tower Guard from play (cannot be saved) to choose and kill a doomed character.
flavor: Yet none of them had a word for her, nor would they deign to tell her what was happening in the world outside.

name: The Dornish Marches
text: Deathbound. Response: after The Dornish Marches comes into play, return all other Battlefield locations to their owners' hands. While you have 4 or more total STR in your dead pile, cancel all triggered effects that would force you to discard 1 or more cards from your hand. [doomed]

name: Scars of the Boneway
text: After a player loses a challenge by 4 or more total STR, he or she may draw a card.
flavor: Death had come to Dorne on raven wings...

name: The Winding Walls
text: Response: kneel The Winding Walls and kneel 1 influence to cancel a response just triggered.
flavor: One window opened to the East so she could watch the sun rise above the sea. The other allowed her to look down upon the Tower of the Sun, the Winding Walls, and the Threefold Gate beyond.

name: Threefold Gate
text: Characters with STR 6 or higher gain stealth and cannot have their STR lowered by card effects.
flavor: ...no doubt she had warned the gods of their coming, for the Threefold Gate was open when they reached it.

name: Dragonglass Dagger
text: Attached character gets +2 STR. Dominance: kneel attached character to choose and discard a Wight character from play (cannot be saved).
flavor: Sam rolled onto his side, eyes wide as the Other shrank and puddled, dissolving away.

name: Savior of Westeros
text:
Attached character gets +2 STR.
While attached character has the highest STR in play, it gains renown and cannot be killed.

name: Coldhands
text: No attachments. Deadly. Coldhands cannot be killed. While there is an Others plot card revealed, Coldhands may be declared as an attacker or defender in any type of challenge.

name: Cotter Pyke
text: No attachments. Response: after a player reveals an Others plot card, kneel all locations and attachments controlled by that player.

name: Denys Mallister
text: No attachments. Any phase: kneel 1 influence to choose a Night's Watch character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR.

name: Fell Crow
text: Deathbound. No attachments. Deadly. Fell Crow cannot be killed. Challenges: kneel 1 influence to give Fell Crow +1 STR until the end of the phase. [doomed]

name: Fickle Merchant
text: Players must pay a +1 gold penalty to play neutral characters.

name: Mance's Men
text: No attachments. Deadly.
flavor: "They'll come right at you, screaming in your face..."

name: Raven from the Wall
text: No attachments. Marshalling: kneel Raven from the Wall to lower the cost of the next character with printed STR 4 or higher you play this game by 1.

name: The Watch in Force
text: No attachments. Deadly. Stealth. Response: after The Watch in Force comes into play or leaves play, choose and kill a Creature or Wildling character.

name: Vanguard Ranger
text: No attachments. Lower the cost to play Vanguard Ranger to 0 while there is at least 1 Others plot card revealed.

name: Ser Waymar Royce
text:
No attachments. Deadly.
Ser Waymar Royce cannot be killed.
You are considered to have an additional doomed card in your dead pile.

name: Small Paul
text: Deathbound. No attachments. Deadly. Small Paul cannot be killed. Marshalling: kneel Small Paul to choose and kill a neutral character with STR 2 or lower. [doomed]

name: Crazed Doomsayer
text: You need one additional doomed card in your dead pile to be eliminated from the game.
flavor: They beg in the winesinks and potshops and foretell doom and destruction to anyone who stops to listen.

name: Fist of the First Men
text:
Deathbound.
While you have 4 or more total STR in your dead pile, add +4 to your total STR for each challenge in which you have at least one attacker or defender.
[doomed]

name: The Land of Always Winter
text: Deathbound. Response: after an Others plot card is revealed, discard The Land of Always Winter from play (cannot be saved) to choose an Others plot card in your used pile and return it to your plot deck.

name: Frostfang Gorge
text: Response: kneel Frostfang Gorge to save a standing doomed location from being discarded.
flavor: The Frostfangs have a cruel bite even in summer, and now...

name: The Haunted Forest
text: While there is at least 1 Others plot card revealed, characters with printed STR 3 or less cannot be saved.

name: The Skirling Pass
text: Each character with the lowest STR in play cannot be declared as an attacker or defender.
flavor: The wind cut like a knife up here, and shrilled in the night like a mother mourning her lost children.

name: Against the Nameless Other
text: Deathbound. Marshalling: if you have 4 or more total STR in your dead pile, lower the cost for you to play characters and locations this phase by 2. [doomed]

name: Azor Ahai Born Again
text: Challenges: choose a non-Army character with the highest STR in play. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth, renown, and does not kneel to attack or defend.

name: Baratheons at the Wall
text: Play only if there is at least one OthersChallenges: kneel X influence to choose and stand X [baratheon] characters. Until the end of the phase, those characters gain the Night's Watch trait and deadly.

name: Dark Fate
text: Deathbound. Any phase: choose and kill a doomed character. [doomed]

name: Death from the Mists
text: Response: after an Others plot card is revealed, each player with 8 or more cards in hand must choose and discard all but 4 cards in his or her hand.

name: Disowned
text: House Lannister only. Any phase: kneel X Battlefield locations to choose X characters. Discard all attachments and power on those characters.

name: Don't Give In!
text: Deathbound. Challenges: choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR. Dominance: kneel 1 influence to return Don't Give In! from your dead pile to your hand.

name: From Winter's Touch Returned
text: Deathbound. Any phase: put into play a non-Army character that was killed this phase. Then, attach From Winter's Touch Returned to that character (counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached character gains the Wight trait. Attached character cannot be killed. You are considered to have an additional doomed card in your dead pile."). [doomed]

name: Greyjoys at the Wall
text: House Greyjoy only. Play only if there is at least one Others plot card revealed. Response: kneel 2 influence to cancel a triggered effect. If that efffect was the ability of a character with STR 3 or lower, kill that character.

name: He Calls It Thinking
text: House Martell only. Response: cancel the effects of a response without influence cost. Then, attach He Calls It Thinking to a [martell] character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text "Attached character gets +2 STR").

name: I Swore It Thrice
text: House Baratheon only. Any phase: move all power from a character to a character with higher STR. Then, attach I Swore It Thrice to a [baratheon] character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text "Attached character gets +2 STR").

name: I'm You Writ Small
text: House Lannister only. Challenges: choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains deadly. Then, attach I'm You Writ Small to a [lannister] character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text "Attached character gets +2 STR").

name: Justice Is Served
text: House Martell only. Response: kneel a Battlefield location to cancel a triggered character or location ability. If that character or location is kneeling, discard it from play (cannot be saved).

name: Lannisters at the Wall
text: House Lannister only. Draw: if there is at least one Others plot card revealed, choose an event card from your discard pile and put it into your hand. Then, put Lannisters at the Wall on the bottom of your deck.

name: Martells at the Wall
text: House Martell only. Draw: each player that has an Others plot card revealed does not count income during the next marshalling phase.

name: Mother have Mercy
text: Any phase: kneel 1 influence to put all non-doomed cards in all dead piles on the bottom of their owners' decks in the order of their owners' choice.

name: None Can Hold the North
text: House Stark only. Challenges: kneel X Battlefield locations to choose and kill X attacking characters.

name: Risen from the Cold
text: Deathbound. Challenges: put into play a non-Army character that was killed to satisfy claim from a [military] challenge this phase. Then, attach Risen from the Cold to that character (counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached character gains the Wight trait, a [military] icon, and gets +3 STR. Attached character cannot be killed. You are considered to have an additional doomed card in your dead pile"). [doomed]

name: Show Trial
text: Deathbound. Any phase: stand all influence-providing locations and character you control. [doomed]

name: Starks at the Wall
text: Play only if there is at least one Others plot card revealed. Challenges: choose and kill an attacking character (cannot be saved) if its STR is lower than the number of defending [stark] characters.

name: Take Heed, Nuncle
text: House Greyjoy only. Any phase: choose and discard from play a location with printed cost 0. Then, attach Take Heed, Nuncle to a [greyjoy] character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text "Attached character gets +2 STR").

name: Targaryens at the Wall
text: House Targaryen only. Plot: for each Others plot card revealed, each character gets -1 STR until the end of the phase and is killed if its STR is 0.

name: The Crows Shall Feast
text: House Greyjoy only. Dominance: kneel 2 influence to discard all Battlefield locations from play. Any phase: kneel 1 influence and discard The Crows Shall Feast from your hand to draw a card.

name: The Final Night Draws Near
text: Deathbound. Any phase: look at an opponent's hand. Then, you may choose one doomed card in that hand and put it into that player's dead pile. [doomed]

name: The Long Night Falls
text: Dominance: kneel 2 influence to choose a player. Until the end of that phase, that player is considered to have 1 additional doomed card in his or her dead pile. Then, discard 1 power from that player's House for each doomed card in his or her dead pile. Limit 1 per phase.

name: The Power of Blood
text: House Baratheon only. Response: after you win a [power] challenge, kneel X Battlefield locations to choose a character. That character claims X power and stands if it is kneeling.

name: They Are My Children
text: House Targaryen only. Challenges: put a character with printed cost 1 or lower into play from your hand. Then, attach They Are My Children to a [targaryen] character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text "Attached character gets +2 STR").

name: They Shall Not Cross
text: House Stark only. Response: save a location from being discarded. Then, attach They Shall Not Cross to a [stark] character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text "Attached character gets +2 STR").

name: Through the Wall
text: Any phase: until the end of the phase, each The North location gains "Response: kneel this card to save a character from being killed."

name: What Kings Are For
text: House Targaryen only. Challenges: kneel X Battlefield locations to choose X characters. Those characters cannot be declared as defenders this phase.

name: Chill Touch of Death
text: When revealed, each player with at least 4 total STR in his or her dead pile chooses and kills a character.

name: Feast or Famine
text: When you count income, you may choose to add +6 gold to your income. If you do, you cannot initiate challenges this round.

name: Fleeing to the Wall
text: When revealed, each player chooses up to 3 locations. All locations not chosen are discarded from play (cannot be saved)

name: Muster the Realm!
text: Any player who controls no Army characters cannot initiate [military] challenges this round.

name: Sacrificed to the Others
text: When revealed, if you have at least 1 Others card in your used pile, choose and discard a location or attachment from play.

name: The First Snow of Winter
text: When revealed, discard from play all character with printed strength 2 or lower (cannot be saved). Card designed by 2005 World Champion John Bruno.
